element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.DoCreateControl
element.short: Create a control with OnCreateControl if not already exists and delay autosizing

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.DisableControlAutoSizing
element.short: Add control to the internal list only once and delay autosizing

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.ControlCount
element.short: Returns number of dockable controls, added via MakeDockable or MakeDockSite or OnCreateControl

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.Controls
element.short: the list of dockable controls, starting at 0

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.IndexOfControl
element.short: Index of control with Name is aName in the list of dockable controls (case insensitive)

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.FindControl
element.short: returns a dockable control with Name is aName (case insensitive)

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.IsSite
element.short: Returns true if control is a site (TAnchorDockHostSite) or custom site (MakeDockSite)

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.IsCustomSite
element.short: returns true if AControl is a custom dock site (MakeDockSite)

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.GetPopupMenu
element.short: returns the shared popupmenu used by all headers and pages.
element.descr: The popup menu is cleared on popup and filled by the headers and pages on Popup.

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.AddPopupMenuItem
element.short: Utility function to easily add a menu item to the popupmenu.

element.name: TAnchorDockMaster.AddRemovePopupMenuItem
element.short: Utility function to add or remove a menu item to/from the popupmenu.
